languages.text: "Других ты казнишь, а своего исповедника-убийцу помилуешь? Подобные двойные стандарты в духе твоей предшественницы".
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."
languages.original_text: "Других ты казнишь, а своего исповедника-убийцу помилуешь? Подобные двойные стандарты в духе твоей предшественницы".

traits.locale_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are true to your predecessor's form."
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are true to your predecessor's form."
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are true to your predecessor's form."
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are true to your predecessor's form."
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."
"You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

languages.text: “你对其他人宣判死刑，却打算赦免你自己的告解神父？这种双标的行为，简直和你的前任行商浪人毫无区别。”
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: “你对其他人宣判死刑，却打算赦免你自己的告解神父？这种双标行为，简直和你的前任行商浪人一模一样。”

languages.text: 「死刑判決を出す人間だというのに、そちら側の非道な聴罪師は赦すと？そのダブルスタンダードな姿勢は、前任者と随分よく似ているやり口だな」
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: 「死刑判決を出す人間だというのに、そちら側の非道な聴罪師は赦すと？そのダブルスタンダードな姿勢は、前任者と随分よく似ているやり口だな」

languages.text: «¿Reparte sentencias de muerte, pero perdona a su propio confesor asesino? Esa doble moral es fiel al modus operandi de su predecesora».
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: «Reparte sentencias de muerte, pero perdona a su propio confesor asesino? Esa doble moral es fiel a su predecesora».

languages.text: "Ihr verteilt Todesstrafen, begnadigt aber Euren eigenen mörderischen Beichtvater? Eine derartige Doppelmoral versteht sich bestens mit dem Modus Operandi Eures Vorgängers."
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verteilt Todesstrafen, begnadigt aber Euren eigenen mörderischen Beichtvater? Eine solche Doppelmoral kennt man von Eurem Vorgänger."

languages.text: « Vous prononcez des condamnations à mort à tour de bras, mais quand c'est votre confesseur qui se révèle coupable de meurtre, vous lui accordez votre pardon ? Cette inégalité de traitement n'est pas sans rappeler le mode opératoire de votre prédécesseure. »
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: « Vous prononcez des condamnations à mort à tour de bras, mais quand c'est votre confesseur qui se révèle coupable de meurtre, vous lui accordez votre pardon ? Votre prédécesseure était elle aussi du genre à faire deux poids deux mesures. »

languages.text: "Herkese idam emri dağıtıyor ama kendi katil günah çıkaranını af mı ediyorsun? Böylesi çifte standartlar, selefinin izlediği yolla oldukça paralellik gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "You dish out death sentences, but you pardon your own murderous confessor? Such double standards are very much in keeping with your predecessor's modus operandi."

traits.locale_text: "Herkese idam emri dağıtıyor ama kendi katil günah çıkaranını af mı ediyorsun? Böylesi çifte standartlar, selefinin izlediği yolla oldukça paralellik gösteriyor."
